generated_body: The article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu" is likely to explore the strategic decisions behind McDonald's continued offering of this particular menu item. Readers may expect insights into consumer preferences, historical context, and market trends that have influenced the retention of the Filet-O-Fish. Specific details might include its popularity during certain seasons, its appeal to diverse dietary needs, or its role in the company's overall marketing strategy. Additionally, the article could speculate on how the Filet-O-Fish may be positioned to attract new customers or retain loyal ones amid changing food trends.
